description: Daybreak Island upgrade priorities and strategy guide

overview.currency: Life Essence (720 wood = 1 Life Essence via Dock)
overview.purpose: Combat buffs via Tree of Life + Prosperity decorations

tree_of_life_priority.description: Tree of Life provides universal buffs, but DECORATIONS provide the BIG troop-type-specific bonuses

milestone_priorities.first_priority: Mythic Battle Decorations for your main troop type (+10% Attack AND +10% Defense)
milestone_priorities.second_priority: Tree of Life L10 for universal +5% Attack, Defense, Health, Lethality
milestone_priorities.key_insight: Decorations give BIGGER bonuses per troop type than Tree of Life gives universally

battle_enhancer_decorations.description: The MAIN source of combat stats from Daybreak - more impactful than Tree of Life

limited_mythic.Serpent Sanctuary: +20% ALL combat stats (Attack, Defense, Health, Lethality)

priority_order: 1. Build BOTH Mythic decorations for your main troop type (Attack + Defense)
2. Level them to max for full +10% each
3. Tree of Life to L10 for universal buffs
4. Consider other troop types if you use mixed compositions
battle_enhancer_decorations.max_potential_per_type: +10% Attack, +10% Defense from Mythic decorations + Tree of Life buffs

decoration_strategy.purpose: Decorations provide Prosperity to unlock Tree of Life levels

recommendation.most_efficient: Mythic decorations (0.10 Prosperity per Life Essence)
recommendation.space_efficient: Mythic decorations also give most Prosperity per slot
recommendation.budget_option: Epic decorations are 80% as efficient but half the cost

f2p.overall_priority: Medium - good long-term value but wood-intensive
strategy: Rush Tree of Life L6 for first combat buff
Use Epic decorations for balance of cost and efficiency
Don't over-invest beyond L6 until Furnace L30 is reached
Tree of Life L10 is a late-game goal, not mid-game

recommended_milestones.reason: March Speed +10% is valuable but requires L10

avoid: Spending Life Essence on decorations beyond Prosperity gates
f2p.wood_budget: Allocate ~50M wood before L30, then reassess

minnow.overall_priority: Medium-High - combat buffs compound with other investments
strategy: Rush Tree of Life L6, then steady progress to L10
Mix of Epic and Mythic decorations

recommended_milestones.reason: March Speed helps in all content

dolphin.overall_priority: High - buffs multiply with your hero/troop investments
strategy: Rush Tree of Life L10 relatively quickly

recommended_milestones.milestone: Tree of Life L10 + Starry Lighthouse

strategy: Tree of Life L10 + Starry Lighthouse as soon as unlocked

rally_lead.reason: Combat buffs directly improve rally performance
rally_lead.focus: Tree of Life L10 for Troops Lethality +5%

filler.reason: Buffs help but not as critical as for leads
filler.focus: Tree of Life L6-8 is sufficient

farmer.reason: Combat buffs less relevant for economy focus
farmer.focus: Tree of Life L6 minimum, then deprioritize

new_player_tips.title: Getting Started on Your Island
new_player_tips.priority_message: Focus on COMBAT STATS (Attack/Defense decorations), NOT on chasing a high Prosperity score!

tips.tip: Upgrade Lumber Camps and Tree of Life ASAP
tips.why: Higher levels = faster Life Essence production. This compounds over time - every day you delay costs you resources.
Storage fills up and you stop generating. Set reminders or collect during daily reset routine.

tips.tip: Move Lumber Camps to direct workers
tips.why: Workers cut trees nearest to the camp. Move camps to control which areas get cleared first.

tips.tip: Use decorations to block worker paths
tips.why: Place water or decorations to funnel workers toward areas you want cleared (like where you spotted a chest).

tips.tip: Unlock second Lumber Camp at Tree L5
tips.why: Doubles your clearing speed. Rush to Tree L5 to unlock this.
You can help allies 3 times and receive 3 assists per day = 6 bonus Life Essence boosts.

treasure_chests.spawn_type: Random - chests appear randomly as trees are cleared
treasure_chests.contents: Life Essence, Hero Shards, Gear, and other rewards
treasure_chests.strategy: Move Lumber Camps toward chest locations when you spot them. Use decorations to block paths and direct workers to the chest area.

common_mistakes.mistake: Building decorations without a Prosperity goal
common_mistakes.why_bad: Decorations beyond Prosperity gates waste Life Essence
common_mistakes.fix: Only build decorations to meet the next Tree of Life gate

common_mistakes.why_bad: FC unlock is more valuable than Daybreak buffs
common_mistakes.fix: Get Tree of Life L6, then focus Furnace to L30

common_mistakes.why_bad: Free combat stats with no downside
common_mistakes.fix: At minimum, get Tree of Life L6 for Troops Health +5%

common_mistakes.why_bad: Lower production rate = less Life Essence over time. This compounds significantly.
common_mistakes.fix: Rush Lumber Camp and Tree upgrades first before buying decorations.

common_mistakes.mistake: Letting Life Essence storage fill up
common_mistakes.why_bad: Once storage is full, you stop generating. Wasted production.
common_mistakes.fix: Collect every 12 hours or set reminders.

integration_with_other_systems.furnace: Daybreak unlocks at F19 but don't let it slow F30 rush
integration_with_other_systems.troops: Daybreak buffs apply to ALL troops - more troops = more value from buffs
integration_with_other_systems.svs: Combat buffs are always active - no activation needed during SvS
integration_with_other_systems.wood_economy: Daybreak competes with building upgrades for wood - balance carefully
